greetingText: Just wanted to make something special for you
wishText: You are the best thing that has happened to me and I wish you all the happiness in the world. I know we can't be together and nearby on your special day but I hope this little gift makes you feel more connected and appreciated hehe I love you sooo much baby, I hope you always know that. Have an amazinggg amazing day, you deserve it! ğŸ¥°ğŸ’“ğŸ’“
